actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code, in order to protect farm property from estate taxation based upon its valuation for nonfarm use.
short_title: Farm Property Estate Tax Valuation Act

summary.text: Farm Property Estate Tax Valuation Act - Provides that the value of real property used in farming by the decedent, included in the gross estate for estate tax purposes under the Internal Revenue Code of 1954, shall be the value of such property for farming purposes, if the executor agrees to the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: Farm Property Estate Tax Valuation Act
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code, in order to protect farm property from estate taxation based upon its valuation for nonfarm use.
